meanings.definition: The quality of being flavorful or tasty.
meanings.sent1: I love the savoriness of the soup.
meanings.sent2: The savoriness of the steak made it irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The savoriness of the cake was so good, I almost licked the plate clean.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always has a touch of savoriness that makes it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The savoriness of the spices lingered on my taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.definition: The enjoyment or appreciation of delicious food.
meanings.sent1: His face lit up with savoriness as he tasted the homemade pie.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table, sharing in the savoriness of the meal.
meanings.sent3: She expressed her savoriness by trying every dessert at the buffet.
meanings.sent4: The savoriness of the barbecue brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent5: The savoriness of the chocolate melted in her mouth, bringing pure joy.

meanings.definition: The essence of deliciousness in a dish.
meanings.sent1: The chef's secret ingredient added an extra level of savoriness to the sauce.
meanings.sent2: The savoriness of the curry was unmatched by any other dish.
meanings.sent3: The savoriness of the pizza made it disappear within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The savoriness of the stew filled the kitchen with a mouth-watering aroma.
meanings.sent5: The savoriness of the dish was so intense, it left everyone craving more.
